CustomField.description: For sync time log records, it is the unique request id for a specific sync call (such as INITIAL SYNC, INCREMENTAL DATA SYNC, or CONFIG SYNC) made by a client app. For logs pushed by client app, it is a string which indicates the operation executed by the client code. This is technical and is meant for troubleshooting by ServiceMax.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For sync time log records, it is the unique request id for a specific sync call (such as INITIAL SYNC, INCREMENTAL DATA SYNC, or CONFIG SYNC) made by a client app. For logs pushed by client app, it indicates the operation executed by the client code.
CustomField.label: Operation
